summary: Commit bazaar using splited view (diff, status and commit comment)
name: bzr-commit
description: This bash script open a vim instance showing diff, status and an editable comment buffer for you commit message.
install_details:
put bzr-commit.sh in ~/bin/
then:
$ chmod +x ~/bin/bzr-commit.sh
use by invoking 
$ bzr-commit.sh
